title: Highlight find matches in DOM Explorer
body:
This feature would improve the find experience in the DOM Explorer to highlight the matching string in the DOM Tree.

Proposed Design
- Find in the DOM Explorer highlights string match by highlighting the background of the text in blue (to match the debugger)
- Highlight find matches in the DOM Explorer gutting with a blue glyph (to match the debugger)
- Change the DOM Explorer to highlight as you type
- Enter, F3 and Shift + F3 to continue to execute and navigate search matches
- Add a progress indicator while executing a find operation
